One of the great mysteries of the Blazing Vale: what's up with the {@LinkCreature:204#1117#Cruental Pylon}?

It clearly has immense power. If only we knew how to tap it...

{@LinkCreature:4#7011#Marakadi} interacts with the pylon all the time. I'll bet she knows something—or has something—connected to the stone.

(The pylon is hot enough to burn you if you touch it.)

(You insert the key, and an engraved tablet emerges from within the stone itself.)
(The pylon is too hot to touch. Perhaps {@LinkCreature:4#7011#Marakadi} has some secret way of interacting with it.)

This was inside the Cruental Pylon? Amazing!

This is engraved with shurian magic, but the shurians don't consort with demons.

Or at least, they never did before. Troubling. But I suppose ignorance is worse, eh?
